channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why crypto OG Dan Morehead believes investors should look beyond Bitcoin
item.description: A former hedge fund manager, Morehead started Pantera, one of the first crypto investment firms.

item.title: The Tides Turn for Trump’s Maritime Industrial Policy
item.description: Instead of promoting the maritime industry, government interventions cripple it.

item.description: The real goal of DOGE is the return the government to the limited, constitutional order envisioned by the founders.

item.title: What The Sports Media Don’t Understand About Scottie Scheffler’s All-Consuming Faith
item.description: Scheffler doesn't play for others or even for his family. He plays for the greater glory of God, whom he entirely credits for his success.

item.description: “You can buy high-end commercial watches almost everywhere, but for anyone who’s a true connoisseur, they go to Switzerland."

item.title: Republicans Fumbled the Ball on Social Security
item.description: They had a chance to institute private accounts 20 years ago but allowed Democrats’ scare tactics to kill the idea. That failure cost us all dearly.

item.title: How Reddit Destroyed Mainstream American Culture
item.description: All mainstream culture is now created by and for resentful geek losers. Everything sucks now, and it’s because of Reddit.
